alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Medina, southern Cuyahoga, northern Summit and east central Lorain Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Strongsville to near North Royalton. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Strongsville, Brunswick, North Royalton, Solon, Twinsburg, Macedonia, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Berea, Middleburg Heights, Brecksville, Bedford, Seven Hills, Bedford Heights and Olmsted Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
